discussion_comments.comment_body: We can use a non-capturing group here so that we avoid some allocations. Also, the regex should take into account the `:[number]` part before the `$`, so it should be changed to something along the lines of (untested): `(?::\d+\$|0x)[a-fA-F0-9]+$`
The memory address is in hex format, so a stricter regex is `/0x[a-fA-F0-9]+$/`
